mapper.select: SELECT s.id as id, s.aboutMe as aboutMe, s.firstName as first_name, s.lastName as last_name, s.mobileNo as mobileNo, c.id AS college_id, c.name AS college_name FROM student s LEFT JOIN student_college sc ON sc.student_id = s.id LEFT JOIN college c ON c.id=sc.college_id

SELECT s.id as id, s.aboutMe as aboutMe, s.firstName as first_name, s.lastName as last_name, s.mobileNo as mobileNo, c.id AS college_id, c.name AS college_name FROM student s LEFT JOIN student_college sc ON sc.student_id = s.id LEFT JOIN college c ON c.id=sc.college_id WHERE s.id=#{studentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student (firstName, lastName, mobileNo,aboutMe) VALUES (#{student.firstName}, #{student.lastName}, #{student.mobileNo},#{student.aboutMe})
